Reviews.Title: Good camera!
Reviews.Author: Ash Kapowi
Reviews.Content: I only have a 4/5 since I've yet to review the video features, but I've loved what it does with photos. The one upset reviewer must have gotten a faulty one because mine works perfectly. Out of all the quick-shot cameras I've had, this one does best in low lights. It also captures colors well. There are a lot of different things you can experiment with. You just have to mess with it a bit and see the settings that you like. (and for those that care, the white color is gorgeous and it has a good texture. The screen is also very nice)

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: yerocer
Reviews.Content: Super small, got this for my gf to keep in her purse. Works great! Only problem is that it uses a micro sd card and I ordered a regular sd card...Whoops.

Reviews.Title: Exceeded my expectations
Reviews.Author: C. Moss
Reviews.Content: The pictures are very crisp.  I like all the features that my last point and shoot did not have.  The HD video is clear, and looks very good.  There are a lot of (optional) manual settings which I like, like f-stop, aperture priority, shutter priority, fisheye setting on video, a setting to make skin appear smoother in portraits, and many more.  I bought this for my mom, played with it and immediately bought one for myself.  Love it.  Smaller than a pack of cigarettes.

Reviews.Title: I was SOOOOO HAPPY that I purchased a replacement camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Bosque "Miklos"
Reviews.Content: I never imagined that digital cameras could have changed so much, but as I prepared for winter in South America, I decided to find a less cumbersome camera... After searching, and reading Amazon reviews, I settled on the Samsung ST77...and WOW!  What a difference.The ST77 wasn't so small that it was difficult for my big hands.  But it was small enough to pack around comfortably for a few months.  And, I have a new favorite feature that I would not be without, every again, in a camera -- the ability to take a "Panoramic" picture.  This feature adds so significantly to telling a photo-story, and it's easy, easy, easy to use.  Other features of import... a close-up capability, night-time/low-light pictures, and a large viewing screen.  And, a great deal too from the Amazon vendor, with prompt delivery!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: R. H. "planner"
Reviews.Content: Purchased especially for a Europe trip. Wanted small with high pixels. Easy to carry securely. Most importantly - set it on auto and snap away. I was especially impressed with the pictures in low light without a flash (museums and churches often prohibit flash if they allow pictures at all). I deleted two pictures out of about 500 which were blurred. The rest were extremely clear and more than met my needs. This is a great little camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: Short battery life when not in use
Reviews.Author: Hobe
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great photos.  Only problem I have found is the battery life is short when camera is off and not being used.  I keep the camera in a drawer when not in use and find the battery mostly discharged after 2 weeks.  It is not the battery because I have several and they all do the same.I have other digital cameras and never had a problem with battery life when not in use.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Cathy-Ann Grant
Reviews.Content: the camera is very nice and takes wonderful photos I recommend it to anyone!!! I promise you wont regret just make sure the camera has its right settings

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Oliver Freed
Reviews.Content: it is a very good product, all offered by the brand and much more, it works perfectly and the size is perfect..

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera!
Reviews.Author: Pam Miller
Reviews.Content: I wanted something small to keep handy for those photos and videos and this was the perfect choice.  I am very pleased!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: lex
Reviews.Content: Small,  compact, easy to use. Great Price. Very user friendlyAt the time of purchase, not many comparable cameras for similar price

Reviews.Title: My little buddy!
Reviews.Author: jerry yergeau
Reviews.Content: this little camera is just what i wanted, works great. i love it,i take it everywhere,people always comment on my photos and say where did you get that thing?

Reviews.Title: Good quality Pictures
Reviews.Author: Danny T. Jones
Reviews.Content: It takes good quality pictures. It has easy to use features and it is not an expensive digital camera. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Rafael Erasmo González
Reviews.Content: comoda, amigable, sencilla, nitidez. buen precio. Tarda mucho en tirar el flash.. me gustaron las opciones de fotografia (nocturno, panoramica, etc.)

Reviews.Title: Misleading
Reviews.Author: GK
Reviews.Content: Amazons"Frequently Bought Together" suggestions is totally misleading.  The Memory Card recommended is the wrong size for the camera.  This camera requires a micro SD card, not the 8 GB SDHC card that was recommended when i purchased the camera.  What's up with that, Amazon?

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Iz
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd digital camera. I love the sizeand the color ( it has lots to choose from), but the camera itself is a little more complicated that I wished for. Too many features, even a friend who is a pro photographer can't figure this one little camera out. I miss a lot ofmoments because it has too many setting. One thing that I really like is the video feature.I researched a lot and when my office got 2 of these cameras I was pleased, gave it a tryand liked it, when I ordered mine and really started playing with it...not so pleased anymore.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Fez
Reviews.Content: Very good camera for the price. Works very well and I love the white color very nice looking. This camera has amazing features and takes pictures with amazing clarity.

Reviews.Title: Battery Sucks
Reviews.Author: Jen
Reviews.Content: Don't expect this thing to hold a charge for more than a day.  The battery is dead all the time. Completely useless.

Reviews.Title: Junk!
Reviews.Author: Cassandra
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after using a friend's Samsung that I loved thinking it would be great. It is awful!A complete waste of money! You have the option of getting clearer pictures OR having the date on them and the clearer pictures are usually blurry. The last 20 I took you could barely tell there was a person in them. Its ridiculous and I'm going to have to try to get a Samsung refund. A camera that can't take halfway decent pictures? I just take pictures of friends and family. I'm not asking too much of it. Seriously though. Don't waste your money. Its hard to get a good picture with this "camera". Oh, and it sometimes randomly shuts off when I am in the middle of pressing buttons and trying to view pictures.

Reviews.Title: GReat purchase indeed
Reviews.Author: kash
Reviews.Content: I have yet to use the camera yet b/cuz i'm waiting for an event on November 1st, but from testing it out I can say all the features and the camera is definitely worth it. Hell of a purchase!

ProductInfo.Features:
Slim stylish Body
16.1 Megapixels 25mm Wide 5X Optical Zoom
Bright F2.5 Lens for Clear Night Shots
Live Panorama
HD Movie Recording (720p, 30fps, MJPEG)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST77 Compact Digital Camera - White - 16.1MP - 5x Optical Zoom
